name: Tomedrop
description:
Grab magical tomes to blast the evil slimes! But beware, the tomes' magic does not last forever. You will need to find more and more tomes to fuel your magics. 

Sounds by FreeSoundEffects.com and ZapSplat.com

"The Complex" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
